content.question: Which of the following are the most appropriate replacements for (missing instance variable) and (missing method)?

choices.label: Replacing (missing instance variable) with - quantity : String and replacing (missing method) with + getQuantity() : String
Replacing (missing instance variable) with - quantity : int and replacing (missing method) with + getQuantity() : int
Replacing (missing instance variable) with - quantity : int and replacing (missing method) with + getQuantity() : String
Replacing (missing instance variable) with - quantity : String and replacing (missing method) with + getQuantity() : int

content.answer: Replacing (missing instance variable) with - quantity : int and replacing (missing method) with + getQuantity() : int

skill.text: 1.A: Determine an appropriate program design to solve a problem or accomplish a task.
